mapper.select: select vvs.vaccine_detail_id, vvd.name vaccine_name, vvd.same_effect, vvd.relevant, vvd.disease_num, vvp.price, vvs.id vaccine_scheme_id, vvs.times, vvs.vaccination_age, vvs.month_num_s, vvs.month_num_e, vvs.immunity_program, vvs.status, vvs.scheme_type, vvs.province_id from v_vaccine_scheme vvs LEFT JOIN v_vaccine_detail vvd on vvd.id=vvs.vaccine_detail_id LEFT JOIN v_vaccine_price vvp on vvp.vaccine_detail_id=vvd.id and vvp.province_id=vvs.province_id where vvs.scheme_type=#{schemeType} and vvs.province_id=#{provinceId}

select count(1) hospitalTimes from (select vaccine_detail_id from v_vaccine_scheme where scheme_type=#{schemeType} and province_id=#{provinceId} and status=1 group by scheme_type, province_id, vaccine_detail_id) t
select count(times) totalDosageNum from v_vaccine_scheme where scheme_type=#{schemeType} and province_id=#{provinceId} and status=1

select sum(t.times*disease_num) vaccineNum from v_vaccine_detail vvd, (select vaccine_detail_id, count(times) times from v_vaccine_scheme where scheme_type=#{schemeType} and province_id=#{provinceId} and status=1 group by vaccine_detail_id) t where vvd.id=t.vaccine_detail_id

select sum(dosage_times*disease_num) vaccineNum from v_vaccine_detail vvd, (select vaccine_detail_id from v_vaccine_scheme where scheme_type=#{schemeType} and province_id=#{provinceId} and status=1 group by vaccine_detail_id) t where vvd.id=t.vaccine_detail_id
select vaccination_age, month_num_s, month_num_e from v_vaccine_scheme where scheme_type=#{schemeType} and province_id=#{provinceId} group by vaccination_age order by month_num_s asc
